query:
INSERT INTO role_permissions (role, permission, description) VALUES
('owner', 'view_all_farms', 'View all owned farms'),
('owner', 'manage_workers', 'Manage farm workers and roles'),
('owner', 'view_financials', 'View financial reports'),
('owner', 'manage_budgets', 'Create and manage budgets'),
('owner', 'export_reports', 'Export financial reports'),
('manager', 'view_assigned_farms', 'View assigned farms only'),
('manager', 'manage_expenses', 'Record and manage expenses'),
('manager', 'view_financials', 'View financial reports'),
('manager', 'manage_animals', 'Manage animal records'),
('worker', 'view_assigned_farm', 'View assigned farm data only'),
('worker', 'record_activities', 'Record daily activities'),
('worker', 'view_animals', 'View animal records'),
('viewer', 'view_assigned_farm', 'View assigned farm data only'),
('viewer', 'view_financials', 'View financial reports (read-only)')
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE description=VALUES(description);
